title: Fatal Reading M4 collision: As it happened - BBC News
summary: m4 was closed through the morning from j11 to j10 .
a pedestrian has died following a collision with a lorry about 03:00 bst .
delays continued in to the afternoon .

documents.title: traffic returns to normal on m4
text: traffic has now returned to normal on the m4 following this morning 's incident , in which a lorry hit and killed a pedestrian close to junction 11 .
we will be ending our live coverage now .
for any further updates listen to bbc radio berkshire or visit bbc berkshire 's home page .

documents.title: iceland pay tribute to m4 crash victim
text: a spokesperson from iceland has released a statement following the fatal crash on the m4 earlier .
we can confirm that an iceland vehicle was involved in an incident on the m4 in the early hours of this morning which led to a fatality .
`` our thoughts are naturally with the family of the deceased at this very sad time and also with our driver .
`` we are unable to comment further until the police have completed their investigation into the incident . ''

documents.title: police appeal for witnesses to m4 crash
text: insp andy storey from thames valley police has asked anyone driving on the m4 near junction 11 at the time of the crash to get in touch .
he said : `` we are trying to determine the circumstances which led to a pedestrian being on the motorway .
`` in addition there are ongoing enquiries to identify the pedestrian at this time . ''

documents.title: pedestrian dies in m4 lorry crash
text: pedestrian dies in m4 lorry crash

documents.title: highways england says long delays are clearing
text: # m4 # berkshire is now fully open eastbound between j11 ( # a33 # reading ) +j10 ( # a329 ( m ) thanks for your patience , long delays are clearing .

documents.title: breakingall lanes of m4 now open
text: the highways agency has confirmed all lanes of the m4 are now open .
thames valley police has said it expects the roads to remain `` heavily congested '' for some time .

documents.title: m4 j11 to 10 closures are being lifted say police
text: the m4 j11 to 10 closures are being lifted .
we expect the roads to remain heavily congested for some time .
sorry for the inconvenience

documents.title: traffic delays affecting reading buses
text: still lots of heavy traffic affecting all services due to the m4 closure .
our drivers are doing their best to get to you , but expect delays !
how late is the 26 bus running now guys ! ?
# readingtraffic

documents.title: traffic still heavy in reading
text: need help with your journey ?
here 's the latest from lower earley way after the closure of m4 london-bound at jct 11/10 @ twitterid
@ twitterid

documents.title: highways england hopes to reopen m4 shortly
text: highways england has said the westbound lane of the m4 ( j10-j11 ) is in the process of reopening .
the agency hopes to open the london-bound section of the m4 ( j11-10 ) before 11:00 .
however , it will take time for the traffic congestion to clear .

documents.title: listeners text bbc radio berkshire with travel tales of woe
text: i left home in goring at 5.55 and meant to be at school to teach children an hour ago ! !
finally made it to work !
very pleased as 7 months pregnant and in need of a comfort break !
2 hours purley to maidenhead .
i 've left the car behind and decided to walk the 4.5 miles to work in threee mile cross .
my brother is currently stuck in traffic in beech hill also trying to get to three mile cross .
he 's moved 0.5 miles in 25 minutes .
i 'm going to race him the rest of the way !
left medway , kent at 5:30 , sat on m4 4hrs journey to cirencester for a training course ! !
need coffee .
it 's taken me an hour so far to try and get from arborfield to winnersh triangle .
been via arborfield garrison , barkham , wokingham and woosehill .
almost there !

documents.title: m4 traffic latest
text: in case you are heading north today , there are major delays on the m4 and across berkshire after a fatal collision at 03:00 bst .
author: Mandy O'Neale
BBC Berkshire travel presenter

documents.title: traffic problems on m3
text: some drivers diverting to avoid the london-bound closure on the m4 past reading are using the m3 this morning , causing heavier than usual conditions in hampshire .
travel : if ever there was a day to take the train between basingstoke & reading , this is it !
m4 closed e'bound between js 11 & 10 .

documents.title: the view at junction 11
text: this is the traffic at junction 11 roundabout in # reading after m4 closed london bound between here & j10 @ twitterid
just to let you know , that your traffic tweet about the m4 was used in our smartphone app today

documents.title: traffic chaos in reading
text: delays across reading as people use the town for a diversion .
passengers have been calling bbc radio berkshire with updates on their journeys .
it 's bad , what ever you try and do to get in to reading at the moment .
i 'm trying all the shortcuts i know .
i 've lived here for 35 years and never ever seen it as bad as this .

documents.title: diversions in place for m4 eastbound closure
text: a local diversion is available for road users intending on using the closed section of motorway ( m4 j11 to j10 london bound ) .
exit at j11 and follow the route marked with a hollow circle symbol on local road signs .
this will take traffic via the b3270 to winnersh , then on to the a329 briefly to join the a329 ( m ) southbound back to the m4 j10 .
road users from further afield heading towards london and destinations in the south east may wish to exit the m4 at j13 and travel north on the a34 to j9 of the m40 and head south to reach the m25 .
please note the diversion route uses single carriageway roads .
road users intending on using the diversion around the closure are advised the allow additional time to complete their journey .
author: Highways England

documents.title: police inspecting the scene
text: following the fatal collision this morning , callers have been telling bbc radio berkshire what they can see as they pass the scene .
there 's about 50 meters of green barriers along the central reservation there were police and traffic officers in the cab [ of the lorry ] doing a quick inspection .

documents.title: m4 traffic latest
text: m4 traffic latest
author: Mandy O'Neale
BBC Berkshire travel presenter

documents.title: problems on the buses in reading
text: traffic is affecting lion 4/x4 between three tuns & winnersh in both directions with delays of up to 16 mins
mereeoak p & amp ; r services are suffering 20+ delays caused by exceptional traffic levels around m4 junction 11
pink 22 from friar st @ 08:00 cancelled due to heavy traffic .
we apologise for any inconvenience .
why cancel a service , the only one that caters for a whole area of reading , because traffic is heavy ? !
crazy !

documents.title: advice from fire service
text: white watch have dealt with a serious incident on the m4 , please drive carefully on the roads and expect delays around the reading area .

documents.title: junction 11 roundabout at a standstill
text: my view from a bridge over junction 11 this morning as # m4 closed between 11 & 10 ( london bound ) @ twitterid

documents.title: pedestrian dies following collision with a lorry
text: a pedestrian has died following a collision with a lorry on the m4 between junctions 10 and 11 .
police were called at to the scene shortly before 03:00 bst .
the pedestrian died at the scene .
the lorry driver is uninjured but in shock .

documents.title: watch : long delays in roads surrounding m4
text: m4 closed london-bound between junction 11 and 10 causing long delays this is whats happening lower earley way @ twitterid
today one of your tweets was used to help others keep up-to-date about uk road traffic :

documents.title: m4 closed london-bound between reading and wokingham
text: good morning ,
the m4 is closed london-bound between junction 11 at reading and junction 10 at wokingham due to a serious incident involving a lorry in the early hours of this morning .
there will be long delays this morning .
we will be bringing you live updates until the incident clears .
